note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Derek Gourlay's dotfiles
body:
### Welcome to Derek Gourlay's dotfiles
Here you will find _dgourlay-dotfiles_ which are simply my most frequently used [dotfiles](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dot-file)  The repo is arranged as a [homesick castle](https://github.com/technicalpickles/homesick).  Installation is easy:

```
$ gem install homesick
$ homesick clone dgourlay/dgourlay-dotfiles
$ homesick symlink dgourlay/dgourlay-dotfiles
```
That's it!

### Author
You guessed it, [dgourlay-dotfiles](https://github.com/dgourlay/dgourlay-dotfiles) are authored by none other than Derek Gourlay (@dgourlay).  However credit for the content cannot go to myself as they are probably kludges of snippets from all over the net!
